app.title: Groundwater | Chat Mode
app.subtitle: Explore state, district, and block level groundwater information.

form.yearsHint: Select none to use the latest year.
form.compareYearsHint: Select years to compare across locations.

messages.noData: No data found for this combination. Try changing the filters.
messages.unableToLoad: Unable to load data. Please try again later.
messages.connectionFailed: Connection failed. Please check your internet and try again.
messages.serverError: Server temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few minutes.
messages.startMessage: Hi! I can help you with groundwater data for India. Which state are you interested in?

chat.askState: Which state are you interested in?
chat.askDistrict: Do you want a specific district, or should I show state-level data?
chat.askYear: Which year? You can say 2023, 2024, or both. If you skip, I'll use the latest year.
chat.done: Do you want to check another location? Tell me a state or hit Start over.

errors.selectLocation: Please select at least one of state, district, or block.
errors.selectDistrict: Pick a district from the list.
errors.selectBlock: Pick a block from the list.
errors.selectStateFirst: Select a state before choosing a district.
errors.selectDistrictFirst: Select a district before choosing a block.
errors.invalidState: State not found. Please select from the dropdown.
errors.invalidDistrict: District not found. Please select from the dropdown.
errors.invalidBlock: Block not found. Please select from the dropdown.
errors.formError: Please pick a state from the list.

complex.title: Complex Queries (Coming Soon)
complex.description: In the future, you'll be able to ask natural language questions like 'Compare groundwater extraction in Rajasthan and Gujarat in 2023 and 2024' and get answers. For now, please use Chat Mode or Quick Mode.
